column5: Hey guys, was wondering if anyone fished the tribs today, and actually caught one! I checked a few but they were all mudded out! I live in the oshawa area, and how long ( if no rain comes for a few days) do you think it will take for the water to clear a bit ? thanks ,tight lines to all.
I liked your first response better
I got 2 but left pretty early I was soaked.

The Notty was chocolate milk today, you could have thrown a glow in the dark golf ball and they still wouldn't have seen it  I did nail a nice hen yesterday on a Lake O trib and lost 2 others, damn Raven flouro!!!!!!

Raven flouro  Bill thatâ€™s no good send it to me  you must have a bad spool bud I landed some nice fish on that stuff. I ran into a bad spool once. You should have been down here the past few days they were amazing especially yesterday.

I dunno what's up with it, 5.6lb stuff.   Lost 2 big fish on Sat...  If I see you on the river you can have it, lol  I think I'll take my chances with Drennan Flouro next...  This is the hen I picked up on Sat, she was spawned out.
me and okuma-sheffield headed out this morning before the rain. together we got about 8 before 10am...then within 1 hour, it was chocolate milk.
I look forward to learning the techniques and finding the spots so I can catch one of these beauties.
It was double-double, not chocolate milk!

good job bill I got 15 between fri and sat and Berge got about 10. Sunday was an unplanned trip Berge called me at 6 am lol I hoped in my car went to grab him. by the time we got there it had been raining for awhile and the rivers were blowing out fast managed 2 then went home.
Nice fishie...  Try Redwing fluoro. Seriously. I was shocked. It's tough as nails.  p.-
